meaningMnemonic:
When your <kanji>purchase</kanji> <kanji>enter</kanji>s into effect, you have made your <vocabulary>purchase</vocabulary>.

購入 is a relatively formal word for the act of purchasing something.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
